title: Übersetzung für ", SCHMERZLINDERUNG" im Englisch
description: Übersetzung im Kontext von „, SCHMERZLINDERUNG“ in Deutsch-Englisch von Reverso Context: Schmerzlinderung
text:
Ein perfekter Begleiter für Regeneration, Schmerzlinderung oder Wohlbefinden.
It is the perfect companion for regeneration, pain relief and well-being.

The interaction affects cellular metabolism in a positive way, resulting in clinical benefits of tissue regeneration, faster wound healing, pain reduction, and functional improvements.
Zu den Ergebnissen gehören Muskelentspannung, Schmerzlinderung, bessere Gewebedurchblutung und bessere Regeneration.
The result is muscle tension relaxation, pain reduction, better blood flow and better regeneration.

The infra sauna is the perfect tool for detoxification, weight loss, relieving pain, skin cleansing and strengthening the immune system.
Die Energien dieser Einstimmung helfen mit Heilung, Schmerzlinderung und dabei, friedlich aus dem Leben zu scheiden, wenn die Zeit dafür gekommen ist.

The therapeutic effects of these substances are blood circulation enhancement, anti-coagulation, pain relief, and anti-inflammation.

A better quality of life by means of stress reduction, pain relief and the development of the vital forces.
Sie bieten tägliche Entspannung, Schmerzlinderung, Spaß mit der Familie und sogar Hilfe bei einigen Krankheiten wie Diabetes und Arthritis.
They can provide daily relaxation, pain relief, family fun, and even help with some medical conditions like diabetes and arthritis.
Schaffen Sie einen Wettbewerbsvorsprung in den Bereichen Physiotherapie, Muskelregeneration, Schmerzlinderung und Verletzungsrehabilitation.
Gain a competitive edge in the fields of physiotherapy, muscle recovery, pain relief and injury rehabilitation.
Massagen Zu den wichtigsten Wirkungen von Massage zählen Entspannung, Schmerzlinderung und die lokale Steigerung der Durchblutung, wodurch der Stoffwechsel angeregt wird.
Relaxation, pain relief and the local improvement in circulation with the stimulation of metabolism are the most important effects of a massage.

There is a lot of controversy about this earliest battery academic community, and its specific uses include electroplating, pain relief or a religious punishment.

Strawberry Lemonade will really wrap you in a colourful cloud of relaxation, pain relief, and invigorating and energetic feelings.

In mechanical traumata, deep oscillation has an additional positive effect with regard to oedema and haematoma reduction, detumescence, pain relief and support of mobility.

Thanks to the infra-red light and the lower temperature, you can fully benefit from health benefits such as detoxification, pain relief and the relaxation of tense muscles.

In a nutshell, cryotherapy chamber treatment offers a wealth of health benefits related to better blood circulation, faster cellular recovery, pain relief, and lowered stress levels.

Its success is based on R&D and the distribution of primary pharmaceutical products, in areas such as bone metabolism, pain relief and respiratory, metabolic and dermatologic diseases.

Special attention is paid to actively reducing stress, pain relief, weight control and Natural Anti-Aging.

Inhalt möglicherweise unpassend
